ing: 1 (8 ounce) package sharp Cheddar cheese, shredded
des: "A summer family favorite. Great with all types of meats. The recipe was given to me years ago by a friend, but I don't have a clue as to the origin."
ins: Break saltines in a bowl, add tomatoes, onion, green bell pepper, cheddar cheese and moisten with  mayonnaise. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill before serving.
